channel.title: updates on Lasseigne Lab
channel.description: Recent content in updates on Lasseigne Lab

item.title: First Update
item.description: It has been an eventful eight months. Our first and most recent entry was posted in March of this year, and much has happened since then! While COVID-19 has had a tragic negative effect on the world around us, we have been very fortunate to have had plenty of positive events as well. Since our last update, Drew has moved on to a neurosurgery residency at Duke University. Randi has also moved on to opportunities elsewhere.
